item.title: Dr. Luz Angélica Caudillo-Mata
item.description:
I am a Computational Scientist and a Bridge Builder.

As a Scientist, I strive to advance the impact of computational geomathematics in the world through my research that sits at the intersection of mathematics, computation, and geophysics. I specialize in the design, analysis, and implementation of computational methods, algorithms, and scientific software for solving geoscientific problems. My professional experience spans Academia, National Labs, and Industry, where I have worked primarily in R&D. Currently, I work at MDA as a Machine Learning Scientist, where I contribute to developing AI-based geointellence technologies.

As a Bridge Builder, I am strongly commited to build a more diverse and inclusive professional community in STEM through initiatives. To that end, I have organized 60+ events and co-founded multiple programs. Currently, I am a co-organizer of RIIAA 2021.

Download my resumé.
